name: Destroy The Fort (Destroy The Fort)
description:
Destroy the fort is a thrilling sandbox FPS where you must use an arsenal of destructive gadgets to destroy the fort, kill the guards and get to the goal in the least time possible!

All in a fully destructible simulated world!

AN ITCH.IO EXCLUSIVE | @DestroyTheFort

This game is quite CPU intensive, RYZEN 5 1600 or equivalent recommended.
